text:
Hi all,
Since there is no #blog channel im writing here.

I am trying to make the blog-listing page _`templateType: blog_listing`_ an to have an editable module on top.
I’ve added the module on the page template, but as far as I understand, this _`templateType: blog_listing`_  template type does not appear in the website pages listing where i can edit

One solution I found is to create a default page with my module, and make it global, so it changes also on the listing (not sure if it will work)
But I first thought of checking if there is another way!
So basically what I need is to have the “Edit page” option on the blog listing page.
Hey Afron, can you send me your HS account/ portal ID?
